Judul: BEYOND THE GREEN BAIZE DOOR: THE BRITISH  DISC  RECORD INDUSTRY BEFORE 1914
Abstrak:
The  talking  machine  is  firmly  established  in  the  homes  of  the  people. 
Its admirers are numbered by the millions ... It has come to stay. It is a 
means to music, which was before unobtainable except to the leisured 
and wealthy classes. It has brought the treasures of the song within the 
reach of all.
Kata Kunci: performance art, sound recording and reproducing
Sumber: Record Collector  Jun 2017, Vol. 62 Issue 2, p232-241. 10p
